description: [Indrik Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0119) has downloaded tools, such as the Advanced Port Scanner utility and Lansweeper, to conduct internal reconnaissance of the victim network. [Indrik Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0119) has also accessed the victimâ€™s VMware VCenter, which had information about host configuration, clusters, etc.(Citation: Mandiant_UNC2165)
